ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:59:42 [Issue ID 4000-166364] urn:comicvine:4000-166364 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:27:53. [Issue ID 230712]
ComicInfo.Summary: The shock of tragedy and the exhilaration of victory weigh against Lord Covenant and Cogliostro as they reluctantly team up for one last adventure. With the Necroplasm back in his grasp, Covenant is faced with an impossible choice: live and die as a man or thrive as an unholy beast. The choice must be made, but along the way terror will take Spawn on a bizarre side road paved with a voracious evil. Welcome to the village of Stonehaven, weary traveler. Rest your feet, close your eyes and wait for the dead to rise.
ComicInfo.Title: The End
